DOC.brief_summary: This survey is conducted for preparing application materials for re-examination under the Pharmaceutical Affairs Laws and its Enforcement Regulation, its aim is to reconfirm the clinical usefulness of sitagliptin/metformin (JANUMET) through collecting the safety and efficacy information according to the Re-examination Regulation for New Drugs.
DOC.criteria: Has type 2 diabetes mellitus Is treated with sitagliptin/metformin within local label for the first time Has a contraindication to sitagliptin/metformin according to the local label Is treated with sitagliptin/metformin before contract and out of enrollment period
